title: Jinlong Ru

Database

TCMSP: a database of systems pharmacology for drug discovery from herbal medicines

title: Roberto Olayo Alarcon
text: Hi there! My name is Roberto Olayo Alarcon. I study AMR with computers.

title: Roberto Olayo Alarcon
text:
Education
Ludwig-Maximilians-Universität München • Germany | PhD in Statistics | Sep 2020 -
Universidad Nacional Autónoma de México (UNAM) • Mexico | B.Sc. in Genomic Sciences | Aug 2016 - Aug 2020

title: gs
